data.eml:eml: Description of a new genus of ponyfishes (Teleostei: Leiognathidae), with a review of the current generic-level composition of the family

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sparks, John S., Chakrabarty, Prosanta (2015): Description of a new genus of ponyfishes (Teleostei: Leiognathidae), with a review of the current generic-level composition of the family. Zootaxa 3947 (2): 181-190, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3947.2.2
